Datepicker

Example

x-model: 
<div x-data="{ model: '' }" class="flex gap-x-10 px-6 justify-stretch">
  <div
    x-data="datepicker"
    x-model="model"
    class="overflow-hidden bg-white text-center text-gray-800 dark:bg-neutral-800 dark:text-gray-300 w-[320px] overflow-hidden rounded-md border border-neutral-300 shadow-md"
  >
    <div class="my-4 grid grid-flow-col grid-cols-6">
      <button
        x-bind="prevYearButton"
        class="mx-auto flex flex-col justify-center rounded px-2 py-1 leading-none focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-violet-200 dark:focus:ring-violet-400"
      >
        <svg
          xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
          width="16"
          height="16"
          fill="currentColor"
          class="bi bi-chevron-double-left"
          viewBox="0 0 16 16"
        >
          <path
            fill-rule="evenodd"
            d="M8.354 1.646a.5.5 0 0 1 0 .708L2.707 8l5.647 5.646a.5.5 0 0 1-.708.708l-6-6a.5.5 0 0 1 0-.708l6-6a.5.5 0 0 1 .708 0"
          />
          <path
            fill-rule="evenodd"
            d="M12.354 1.646a.5.5 0 0 1 0 .708L6.707 8l5.647 5.646a.5.5 0 0 1-.708.708l-6-6a.5.5 0 0 1 0-.708l6-6a.5.5 0 0 1 .708 0"
          />
        </svg>
      </button>
      <button
        x-bind="prevMonthButton"
        class="mx-auto flex flex-col justify-center rounded px-2 py-1 leading-none focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-violet-200 dark:focus:ring-violet-400"
      >
        <svg
          xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
          width="16"
          height="16"
          fill="currentColor"
          class="bi bi-chevron-left"
          viewBox="0 0 16 16"
        >
          <path
            fill-rule="evenodd"
            d="M11.354 1.646a.5.5 0 0 1 0 .708L5.707 8l5.647 5.646a.5.5 0 0 1-.708.708l-6-6a.5.5 0 0 1 0-.708l6-6a.5.5 0 0 1 .708 0"
          />
        </svg>
      </button>
      <div
        x-text="currentDate"
        class="col-span-2 inline-block font-bold"
      ></div>
      <button
        x-bind="nextMonthButton"
        class="mx-auto flex flex-col justify-center rounded px-2 py-1 leading-none focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-violet-200 dark:focus:ring-violet-400"
      >
        <svg
          xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
          width="16"
          height="16"
          fill="currentColor"
          class="bi bi-chevron-right"
          viewBox="0 0 16 16"
        >
          <path
            fill-rule="evenodd"
            d="M4.646 1.646a.5.5 0 0 1 .708 0l6 6a.5.5 0 0 1 0 .708l-6 6a.5.5 0 0 1-.708-.708L10.293 8 4.646 2.354a.5.5 0 0 1 0-.708"
          />
        </svg>
      </button>
      <button
        x-bind="nextYearButton"
        class="mx-auto flex flex-col justify-center rounded px-2 py-1 leading-none focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-violet-200 dark:focus:ring-violet-400"
      >
        <svg
          xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
          width="16"
          height="16"
          fill="currentColor"
          class="bi bi-chevron-double-right"
          viewBox="0 0 16 16"
        >
          <path
            fill-rule="evenodd"
            d="M3.646 1.646a.5.5 0 0 1 .708 0l6 6a.5.5 0 0 1 0 .708l-6 6a.5.5 0 0 1-.708-.708L9.293 8 3.646 2.354a.5.5 0 0 1 0-.708"
          />
          <path
            fill-rule="evenodd"
            d="M7.646 1.646a.5.5 0 0 1 .708 0l6 6a.5.5 0 0 1 0 .708l-6 6a.5.5 0 0 1-.708-.708L13.293 8 7.646 2.354a.5.5 0 0 1 0-.708"
          />
        </svg>
      </button>
    </div>
  
    <div class="mb-2 grid grid-cols-7">
      <template x-for="weekday in weekdays">
        <div
          x-text="weekday"
          class="text-sm font-semibold dark:text-gray-300"
        ></div>
      </template>
    </div>
  
    <div class="relative mb-2 grid grid-cols-7">
      <template x-for="d in days" :key="d.toISOString()">
        <button
          x-bind="day"
          x-text="d.getDate()"
          class="mx-1 my-1 flex h-9 w-9 cursor-pointer items-center justify-center rounded-full py-1 text-sm font-semibold hover:bg-neutral-200"
          class:today="!font-bold text-violet-400 dark:text-violet-400 border border-violet-400"
          class:adjacent="text-gray-800/20 dark:text-gray-200/10"
          class:selected="!text-white dark:text-gray-200 bg-violet-400 dark:bg-violet-500 hover:!bg-violet-600 dark:hover:bg-violet-700"
          class:selected-range="!text-white dark:text-gray-200 bg-violet-400 dark:bg-neutral-600 hover:!bg-violet-600 dark:hover:bg-neutral-500"
          class:partially-selected="text-gray-800 dark:text-gray-300 bg-gray-300 dark:bg-neutral-700"
        ></button>
      </template>
    </div>
  
    <div
      x-text="todayFormatted"
      class="bg-gray-100 py-1 text-sm font-semibold dark:bg-neutral-700 dark:text-gray-300"
    ></div>
  </div>

  <div class="font-mono text-lg">
    x-model: <span x-text="JSON.stringify(model)"></span>
  </div>
</div>

Usage

To use this component simply copy and paste minimal template or any template from the examples below.

The props for the component are provided by the datepicker function in the x-data directive. This function takes single object as argument.

datepicker({
    range: Boolean,
    mondayFirstWeekday: Boolean,
    adjacentMonths: Boolean,
    locale: String,
})
range false Boolean

Allows selection of date ranges. Changing this prop resets component.

mondayFirstWeekday true Boolean

Week starts on Monday

adjacentMonths true Boolean

If true days from previous and next month are displayed. Classes for these days can be modified in the class:adjacent attribute in the template.

locale en-GB String

This prop is only used to display names of the months and weekdays and to format date in the components footer. It does not modify format of the x-model date which is always YYYY-MM-DD.
